name: Virtual D20 Simulator
description:
The ULTIMATE MTG Companion

The Virtual D20 Simulator has two modes

  • Spindown Mode: Used to keep track of how much health (or anything similar) you have
  • Random Mode: Need a random number? You got it!

Controls

Left/Right Arrows: choose your mode (main menu only)

Up Arrow: enter mode (main menu only)

Up/Down Arrows: change the number

Enter: return to main menu
